clip.quote: A photo and a little bit of text will never be able to compete with a video. This is the reason why TV and movies do so well.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the power of video in building relationships and trust, resonating emotionally with the audience.
clip.suggested_hook: Why video trumps photos in real estate marketing.
